subject: Re: [junit] black box or white box?

messageBody:
It's a question of scale.
- On the unit level you are performing black box testing. JUnit only
interacts with the external interface of the current unit of functionality
which you are testing. It does not care how it is implemented, only how it
behaves.
- On the system or application level it is white box testing. You are not
only testing the system's external interface. You are testing it's
internal components and ensuring that each internal component performs
correctly.
